hero.title: Welcome to ANKH
hero.subtitle: Professional Training Platform for Organizations
hero.description: Join our exclusive platform designed specifically for organizations, associations, and institutions. Access high-quality training courses, secure video streaming, and comprehensive learning resources.

features.title: Platform Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need for effective organizational training

secure.title: Secure Access
secure.description: Controlled environment with admin approval system ensuring only verified organizations can access content.

video.title: Video Streaming
video.description: High-quality secure video streaming for all your training courses with advanced playback controls.

pdfs.title: PDF Resources
pdfs.description: Download comprehensive PDF materials and resources to support your learning journey.

quizzes.title: Interactive Quizzes
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge with interactive quizzes and track your progress throughout the courses.

organizations.title: Organization Focused
organizations.description: Designed specifically for organizations, associations, and institutions, not individual users.

management.title: Admin Management
management.description: Full administrative control over organizations, courses, and content visibility.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple steps to get started with ANKH

register.title: Register
register.description: Submit your organization registration request with all required information and documents.

approval.title: Admin Approval
approval.description: Wait for admin review and approval of your organization registration.

access.title: Get Access
access.description: Once approved, log in and access the platform with full privileges.

learn.title: Start Learning
learn.description: Purchase courses, watch videos, download PDFs, and complete quizzes to enhance your skills.

certified.title: Certified Content
certified.description: Access to professionally developed and certified training courses from industry experts.

flexible.title: Flexible Learning
flexible.description: Learn at your own pace with 24/7 access to all course materials and resources.

support.title: Dedicated Support
support.description: Get assistance from our support team whenever you need help with the platform or courses.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join ANKH today and give your organization access to professional training courses.
